entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:21 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -35.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
